channel.title: Anka Design Studio

item.title: Ashburton
item.description: This 1920s Californian bungalow in the heart of Ashburton was completely transformed into a beautiful grand home with each area serving a purpose. A minimalistic design ensured the Carrara marble and ravine joinery were the standout heroes while re-instating the character of the home by keeping the dental cornicing, original lead-light windows and whitewashed original hardwood flooring.
